ba.stun.description: Unable to move, block, attack and use skills

ba.buffres.description: Reduce duration of abnormal effects such as <$ba.stun>Stun</>, <$ba.cold>Chill</>, <$ba.frozen>Freeze</> by 50% (Does not stack)

ba.invisible.description: When unblocked/not blocking, will not be attacked by enemies

ba.camou.description: When not blocking, will not be targeted by enemy normal attacks (unable to avoid splash-type attacks)

ba.fragile.description: Increase all damage taken by the stated percentage (Does not stack, strongest effect takes precedence)

ba.shield.description: Each layer of shield can block one instance of damage

ba.protect.description: Reduce Physical and Arts damage taken by the stated percentage (Does not stack, strongest effect takes precedence)

ba.cold.description: Attack Speed -30. If Chill effect is stacked, effect changes to <$ba.frozen>Freeze</>

ba.frozen.description: Unable to move, attack and use skills (Activated through <$ba.cold>Chill</> effect)

ba.sleep.description: Invulnerable and unable to take action

ba.inspire.description: Gain additional stats based on the effect (Strongest effect of each stat takes precedence)
